items.sentence: Tom threatened to leave if he didn't get a raise.
Tom has bitten his nails right down to the quick.
The barking dog kept Tom awake most of the night.
Tom and Mary hit it off big time from the get-go.
Tom pleaded with Mary to give him another chance.
There's no love lost between Tom and his brother.
Tom's knee hurts when he walks up or down stairs.
Tom flirted with both Mary and Alice all evening.
It doesn't matter to me. I'll leave it up to you.
We still have a long way to go to reach our goal.
